oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Certificate of discharge for William M. Smith
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Certificate of discharge for Pvt. William M. Smith, Co. F, 6th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. Smith enrolled on December 26, 1862, and was discharged on July 26, 1865. A resident of Hardin County at the time of his enlistment, Smith was born in Montgomery County, N.C., and was 32 years old at the time of his discharge. The birth and death dates of his wife, Margret (1852-1930), are written in pencil on the back of the certificate.
